data.title: Washington Nationals 2024 MLB Regular Season Batting Stats
data.meta_description: Get the full batting stats for the 2024 Regular Season Washington Nationals on ESPN. Includes team leaders in batting average, RBIs and home runs.
data.text:
Team leaders

Bold : Qualified for batting title (3.1 plate appearances per team game)

* Midseason Trades : Jesse Winker ( 9 GP NYM ) ; Lane Thomas ( 13 GP CLE ) ; Eddie Rosario ( 24 GP ATL ) ; Nick Senzel ( 9 GP CHW ) ; Harold Ramirez ( 48 GP TB ) ; Victor Robles ( 42 GP SEA ) ; Jose Tena ( 3 GP CLE )
